amendment.description: To propose the insertion of matter in lieu of the matter proposed to be stricken.

vote.text: Amendment SA 783 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 191.

action.text: Amendment SA 783 proposed by Senator McCain to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. SA 725. (consideration: CR S6823-6827; text: CR S6823-6824) To propose the insertion of matter in lieu of the matter proposed to be stricken.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 783 proposed by Senator McCain to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. SA 725.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 783 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 191.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 783 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 191.
